title: Bupiao
sinopse: There was an rabbit.It went to a amusement park with his friend,who was a little kangaroo.The tickets were sole out.Then the mom of the little kangaroo had a ticket.Then the rabbit and the little kangaroo hided in the bag of the kangaroo.After they went in the park.They joined a competition and won the award.Then the rabbit thought it was unfair so it told the staff it sneaked in the park.(source:douban)
